Value proposition

Many people choose to work remotely, or be a nomad and travel around the world with their work. While this may be easy for some, to others it looks like a difficult and daunting task.

Re.Now connects you to get coached by the people who have tried, tested and triumphed the remote working lifestyle, so that you too can begin your journey.

About Us

We believe that time and geography should not draw boundaries around your life. Location independent work is the future, and the future is already here.
